alert.note: Alert for Santa Rosa Coastal (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 3:56PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Santa Rosa County through 345 PM CDT... At 254 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm near Pensacola Beach, or over Gulf Breeze, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gulf Breeze and Oriole Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
